      • landedOn

        public void landedOn(Player player)
        This method decides the operation depending on the type of the tile. This method is overridden in all subclasses.
        Parameters:
        player - player that landed on the tile

      • teleport

        public static void teleport(Player player,
                            int tileID)
        This method is used to move a player directly to another tile by using the tile id of desired tile.

        Parameters:
        player - player that will be moved
        tileID - id of the tile that player will be moved to
        See Also:
        Player
